data.text:
Friends, last Night was Day 33 of our REVIVAL at The Harvest Church in Monroe, GA! Get this‚Ä¶An 11 Year Old Girl that started coming to our Church only a Week ago, looked at me at the end of the Service last Night and said, ‚ÄúI Found JESUS Tonight!!!‚Äù She had the biggest Smile on her Face. We then went together and told my Pastor Jonathon Frank Mckinney! We all were Smiling so big!! Evangelist Billy Hall Preached a POWERFUL & LIFE-CHANGING Message AGAIN!!! It gets Better Every Night!!! Come be my Guest TONIGHT at 7:00 PM! You will never ever be the same Again!! See y‚Äôall Tonight!!! ‚ù§Ô∏èüî•‚ù§Ô∏èüî•‚ù§Ô∏èüî• The Harvest Church 1910 Sardis Church Rd Monroe, GA 30655 https://lnkd.in/gM4rJ9HG

Friends, what an UNBELIEVABLE Move of GOD Tonight at The Harvest Church in Monroe, GA!! Worship & then the Word by Evangelist - Brother Billy Hall was SPECTACULAR!! At the end of the Service Tonight, an 11 Year Old Girl looked at me and said, ‚ÄúI found JESUS Tonight!!‚Äù Enough said!! Hope to See Many of You Tomorrow Night (Thursday 8-15-24) for Night 34 of REVIVAL!! ‚ù§Ô∏èüî•‚ù§Ô∏èüî• https://lnkd.in/eWZnXpBD
